location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that the ships Duncanand Sophiaarrived in Bushire on the 29 and 30 May respectively. They were not subject to pirate attacks, but saw boats and were informed that a small fleet from Ras el Khima [Ras al-Khaimah] was cruising at the entrance of the Gulf.
